name: Panzer Elite Action: Fields of Glory
name_original: Panzer Elite Action: Fields of Glory
description:
Panzer Elite Action: Fields of Glory is an action-arcade game developed by Zootfly. It came out on 11-04-2006. It was published by JoWooD Productions. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
Panzer Elite Action: Fields of Glory is available on PC.
